resources.string:
Hello! My name is Michael, but you can call me Mike. 

As a Junior Android Engineer I can build apps like this one from the ground up, including concept, design, logic, deployment and maintenance. 

Though the apps that I have created are simple, I feel like they demonstrate fair ability and competence for a Junior position, don't you? 

I am currently learning Jetpack, which will strengthen my skill set and streamline my productivity. 

I know that my biggest setback is not having any professional, paid experience. I have noticed this to be a common problem with new engineers. All I need is that one company to take a chance and give me the opportunity to excel. I know that i'm made for this industry. Before you know it, you'll be wanting 20 more just like me. 

Thank you for the consideration!
